properties.name: opensearch.max-connections-per-route
properties.description: The maximum connection per route value.

properties.name: opensearch.evict-expired-connections
properties.description: Whether proactively evict expired connections from the connection pool using a background thread.

properties.name: opensearch.evict-idle-connections
properties.description: The maximum time persistent connections can stay idle while kept alive in the connection pool. Connections whose inactivity period exceeds this value will get closed and evicted from the pool.
